artist: Artist: Onchi Kōshirō; Printer: Hirai Kōichi
description: abstract image; two curvalinear outlines over a black block on right side and a varigated grey block on left; portion of curvalinear form that overlays grey block is white with spotted oviod form
markings: on back, stamped in brown and written in black ink: [Title Past (title written--followed by two Japanese title) / by Koshiro Onchi / Memorial Edition Publisher Sep. /-55 (date written) / Printed by Kōichi Hirai]; LLC on back, in pencil: [4000-]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Poem No. 15: Past
